statements: SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-05-30';
SELECT meeting_id, organizer FROM meetings WHERE organizer = 'Alice';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-06-15' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE organizer = 'Bob' AND meeting_time < '14:00:00';
SELECT meeting_id, agenda, attendees FROM meetings WHERE agenda ILIKE '%presentation%' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings WHERE organizer = 'John Doe' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT organizer, COUNT(attendees) FROM meetings GROUP BY organizer HAVING COUNT(attendees) > 5;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(attendees) AS num_attendees FROM meetings ORDER BY num_attendees DESC, meeting_date ASC;
SELECT CONCAT(organizer, ' has organized a meeting on ', meeting_date) AS meeting_details FROM meetings;
SELECT * FROM meetings_schedule;
SELECT meeting_date, start_time, end_time FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT topic FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-10-15' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_id, start_time, end_time, topic FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT agenda_item, presenter FROM meeting_agendas WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, topic FROM meetings_schedule WHERE topic LIKE '%Project%' ORDER BY topic ASC, meeting_id DESC;
SELECT m.meeting_id, m.meeting_date, a.agenda_item, a.presenter FROM meetings_schedule m JOIN meeting_agendas a ON m.meeting_id = a.meeting_id WHERE m.meeting_date = '2022-10-15';

SELECT m.meeting_date, m.start_time, m.end_time, COUNT(a.agenda_id) AS agenda_count FROM meetings_schedule m LEFT JOIN meeting_agendas a ON m.meeting_id = a.meeting_id GROUP BY m.meeting_date, m.start_time, m.end_time ORDER BY agenda_count DESC;

SELECT topic, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM meetings_schedule m JOIN meeting_agendas a ON m.meeting_id = a.meeting_id GROUP BY topic HAVING total_duration > 120 ORDER BY total_duration DESC, topic ASC;
SELECT * FROM Meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_duration FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_duration > '1 day';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_title, meeting_date FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_title ILIKE '%planning%';
SELECT p.participant_name, p.participant_email, m.meeting_title FROM Participants p INNER JOIN Meetings m ON p.meeting_id = m.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM Meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_duration FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, meeting_title FROM Participants INNER JOIN Meetings ON Participants.meeting_id = Meetings.meeting_id WHERE meeting_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, is_accepted FROM Meetings JOIN Invitation ON Meetings.meeting_id = Invitation.meeting_id WHERE is_accepted = TRUE;
SELECT participant_name, meeting_title FROM Participants JOIN Meetings ON Participants.meeting_id = Meetings.meeting_id ORDER BY participant_name ASC, meeting_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date, meeting_time, agenda FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE meeting_id = 123;
SELECT room_name, room_capacity FROM rooms WHERE room_capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, room_capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY room_capacity DESC;
SELECT m.meeting_title, r.room_name FROM meetings m JOIN meetings_rooms mr ON m.meeting_id = mr.meeting_id JOIN rooms r ON mr.room_id = r.room_id WHERE m.meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, agenda FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_role = 'Organizer';
SELECT * FROM calendar WHERE meeting_date = '2022-12-31' AND meeting_time > '09:00';
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time, COUNT(attendees) AS total_attendees FROM meetings JOIN attendees ON meetings.meeting_id = attendees.attendee_id GROUP BY meeting_date, meeting_time
SELECT * FROM calendar JOIN meetings ON calendar.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id WHERE meeting_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_date, attendees.attendee_name FROM meetings JOIN attendees ON meetings.meeting_id = attendees.attendee_id ORDER BY meeting_date DESC
SELECT room_name, capacity, COUNT(meetings.meeting_id) AS total_meetings FROM rooms LEFT JOIN calendar ON rooms.room_id = calendar.meeting_id GROUP BY room_name, capacity ORDER BY total_meetings DESC
